Detailed Description

Manages creation of Chart objects.

Manages creation of the chart objects ChartPie ChartRow aso.

Member Function Documentation

& ChartFactory::Factory (  $  type,
$  poll
) 
 

Creates the Chart objects -- call statical ie. ChartFactory::Factory('Pie');

Parameters:
$type the type of Chart object to create
$poll a Poll object, this is the poll that the chart will graf
Returns:
Error object on error, Chart object on sucess
